name: Integrated Demonlist
description: A mod that integrates a list of the top extreme demons, according to aredl.net, into Geometry Dash.

enable-rank.name: Enable Demon Ranking Text
enable-rank.description: Whether or not to display the demon ranking text.

white-rank.name: White Demon Ranking Text
white-rank.description: Whether or not to display the demon ranking text in white.
